name: @plexus/ui-aerospace
description: Monorepo for primitive-based aerospace component library with planetary visualization components for React Three Fiber

scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm publish --workspaces --access public
scripts.publish:cli: npm run build:cli && npm publish -w @plexusui/cli --access public
scripts.publish:earth: npm run build:earth && npm publish -w @plexusui/earth --access public
scripts.publish:mars: npm run build:mars && npm publish -w @plexusui/mars --access public
scripts.publish:mercury: npm run build:mercury && npm publish -w @plexusui/mercury --access public
scripts.publish:venus: npm run build:venus && npm publish -w @plexusui/venus --access public
scripts.publish:moon: npm run build:moon && npm publish -w @plexusui/moon --access public
scripts.publish:jupiter: npm run build:jupiter && npm publish -w @plexusui/jupiter --access public
scripts.publish:saturn: npm run build:saturn && npm publish -w @plexusui/saturn --access public
scripts.publish:uranus: npm run build:uranus && npm publish -w @plexusui/uranus --access public
scripts.publish:neptune: npm run build:neptune && npm publish -w @plexusui/neptune --access public
scripts.publish:gantt: npm run build:gantt && npm publish -w @plexusui/gantt --access public
scripts.publish:orbital-path: npm run build:orbital-path && npm publish -w @plexusui/orbital-path --access public
scripts.publish:ground-track: npm run build:ground-track && npm publish -w @plexusui/ground-track --access public
scripts.publish:trajectory: npm run build:trajectory && npm publish -w @plexusui/trajectory --access public
scripts.publish:transfer-orbit: npm run build:transfer-orbit && npm publish -w @plexusui/transfer-orbit --access public
scripts.publish:lagrange-points: npm run build:lagrange-points && npm publish -w @plexusui/lagrange-points --access public
scripts.publish:orbital-math: npm run build:orbital-math && npm publish -w @plexusui/orbital-math --access public
scripts.publish:constants: npm run build:constants && npm publish -w @plexusui/constants --access public
